name: Phantom Mirror (prototype)
description:
Phantom Mirror is a 3D puzzle platformer where you control two ghosts that emulates each other movements. 

This is a prototype and there's currently only one level, I'm still uncertain if I will continue it's developement.

Controls:

-WASD/arrow keys: movement

-Mouse: camera movement

-Q: while looking at your clone: switch control

-E: interact with items/buttons

-R: restart from checkpoint
